name: kui-shell
description: This is the monorepo for Kui, the hybrid command-line/GUI Kubernetes tool (now powered by Tauri)

scripts.test:browser: export KUI_USE_PROXY=true; export MOCHA_RUN_TARGET=webpack; npm run test
scripts.test: export MONOREPO_MODE=true; cd packages/test && npm run test
scripts.build:tauri:mac:amd64: npm run build:prep && cd src-tauri && cargo build --release --target x86_64-apple-darwin
scripts.build:tauri:mac:arm64: npm run build:prep && cd src-tauri && cargo build --release --target aarch64-apple-darwin
scripts.build:tauri:linux:amd64: npm run build:prep && cd src-tauri && cargo build --release --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
scripts.build:tauri:linux:arm64: npm run build:prep && cd src-tauri && cargo build --release --target aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu
scripts.build:tauri:win32:amd64: npm run build:prep && cd src-tauri && cargo build --release --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc
scripts._kill: if [ -f /tmp/kuiwatch-$T.pid ]; then PID=$(cat /tmp/kuiwatch-$T.pid); if [ -n "$PID" ]; then kill $PID > /dev/null 2> /dev/null || true; fi; fi
scripts.kill: T=client npm run _kill; T=headless npm run _kill
scripts.kill:proxy: if [ -f /tmp/kuiproxy.pid ]; then PID=$(cat /tmp/kuiproxy.pid); if [ -n "$PID" ]; then kill $PID > /dev/null 2> /dev/null || true; fi; rm -f /tmp/kuiproxy.pid; fi
scripts._watch: bash -c "npm run kill; export CSP_ALLOWED_HOSTS='http: https: data: filesystem: about: blob: ws: wss:'; kui-watch-webpack"
scripts.watch:webpack: npm run kill; npm run pty:nodejs && npm run _watch $WATCH_ARGS
scripts.watch:browser: concurrently -n COMPILE,WEBPACK --kill-others 'npm run watch:source' 'npm run watch:webpack'
scripts.watch:browser:offline: export IS_OFFLINE_CLIENT=true; concurrently -n COMPILE,WEBPACK --kill-others 'npm run watch:source' 'npm run watch:webpack'
scripts.proxy: export PORT=8081; npm run kill:proxy; export KUI_USE_HTTP=true; cd packages/proxy/app && npm install && ../../../tools/travis/proxy.sh ../../..
scripts.compile:source:es6: (tsc -p packages/core/tsconfig.json || true) && (tsc -p packages/test/tsconfig.json || true) && (tsc -p packages/react/tsconfig.json || true) && (tsc -p plugins/plugin-bash-like/fs/tsconfig.json || true) && (tsc -p plugins/plugin-bash-like/tsconfig.json || true) && (tsc -p plugins/plugin-client-common/notebook/tsconfig.json || true) && (tsc -p plugins/plugin-client-common/tsconfig.json || true) && (tsc -p plugins/plugin-core-support/tsconfig.json || true) && (tsc -p plugins/plugin-client-default/tsconfig.json || true) && (tsc -p plugins/plugin-kubectl/components/tsconfig.json || true) && (tsc --build tsconfig.json || true)
scripts.rebuild: npm run compile:clean; npm run compile
scripts.clean: npm run compile:clean; rm -rf node_modules; for i in plugins/*; do rm -rf $i/node_modules; done; for i in packages/*; do rm -rf $i/node_modules; done
